SEARCH
Module HospitalManagementSystem
Package controllers

Class DoctorController

java.lang.Object
controllers.DoctorController
public class DoctorController extends Object
The DoctorController class manages the operations of a doctor within the healthcare system. It provides functionalities for handling patient records and managing appointments. It includes methods for managing patient diagnoses, prescriptions, treatment plans, and setting up appointment availability and handling appointment requests.

  • Method Details

    • getPatientsRecords

      public PatientRecords getPatientsRecords()
      Retrieves the list of patients assigned to the doctor based on their appointments.
      Returns:
      A PatientRecords object containing the list of patients

    • updatePatientRecords

      public boolean updatePatientRecords(String patientId, String newDiagnoses, String prescriptions, String treatmentPlan)
      Updates the patient's records with new diagnoses, prescriptions, and treatment plans.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient
      newDiagnoses - The new diagnoses to be added
      prescriptions - The prescriptions to be added
      treatmentPlan - The treatment plan to be added
      Returns:
      true if the update is successful, false otherwise

    • setAvailability

      public boolean setAvailability(String date, String time)
      Sets availability for the doctor by creating empty appointment slots for specific dates and times.
      Parameters:
      date - The date for the appointment slot
      time - The time for the appointment slot
      Returns:
      true if the availability is successfully set, false if an appointment already exists at the same time

    • getEmptySlots

      public List<String> getEmptySlots(String date)
      Retrieves the list of empty appointment slots for a specific date.
      Parameters:
      date - The date for which empty slots are being retrieved
      Returns:
      A list of empty appointment slots available for the given date

    • getAppointmentRequests

      public List<Appointment> getAppointmentRequests()
      Retrieves all pending appointment requests for the logged-in doctor.
      Returns:
      A list of pending appointments for the logged-in doctor

    • handleAppointmentRequest

      public boolean handleAppointmentRequest(String appointmentId, boolean isAccepted)
      Handles the acceptance or decline of an appointment request.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to handle
      isAccepted - true if the appointment is accepted, false if declined
      Returns:
      true if the appointment status is successfully updated, false otherwise

    • getUpcomingAppointments

      public List<Appointment> getUpcomingAppointments()
      Retrieves a list of upcoming appointments for the logged-in doctor.
      Returns:
      A list of upcoming appointments for the logged-in doctor

    • recordAppointmentOutcome

      public boolean recordAppointmentOutcome(String appointmentId, String date, String serviceType, List<String> medications, List<Integer> medicationQTY, String notes)
      Records the outcome of an appointment, including prescribed medications and notes.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment
      date - The date of the appointment
      serviceType - The type of service for the appointment
      medications - A list of prescribed medications
      medicationQTY - A list of medication quantities
      notes - Additional notes for the appointment
      Returns:
      true if the outcome is successfully recorded, false otherwise
